text: fa'amaa aladhin shaquu fi aldunya lfsad eqydthm wsw' aemalhm, falnaar mstqrhm, lahum fiha min shdt maa hum fih min aleadhab zafir wshhyq, wahuma ashne al'aswat waqbhha, maakithin fi alnaar abdana ma damat alsmwat walard, fala ynqte edhabhm wala ynthy, bal hu dayim mwkkad, 'iilaa ma sha' rabuk min 'iikhraj esat almwhdyn baed mddat min mkthhm fi alnar. 'iina rabak -ayha alrswl- feeal lima yryd
